lines: ũka kwĩ Jesũ ndũkaarege, ũka ũmũthĩ ũmwĩtĩkie,
Tondũ arĩ haha Jesũ mwene, Agĩkwĩra, “ũka”
Tũgakena mũno mũno ma, Twagirio gũcooka kwagana,
Tũtũũre nake Mũhonokia, Tene o na tene.
ũka kwĩ Jesũ ndũkaarege, Reke Ibuku rĩgũtaare,
Nĩrĩo rĩandĩke njĩra yake, Nake ekuuga “ũka”.
ũka kwĩ Jesũ ndũkaarege, igua mũgaambo ũcio wake,
ũka kwĩ Jesũ ndũkaarege, Ngai nĩekwenda agũciare,
Na ũndũ wa Jesũ akuohere, Nake ekuuga “ũka”
